name: Paralax
description:
2D action platformer with time paradox mechniac.

You have to face evil quantum computer that is disrupting our spacetime. You are are trapped in zone outside of time line. You're only advantage is that even if you die, you’re alter egos from other timelines will come to help you. With one is youre true identify? Will any of time lines be able to defeat Quantum Computer? All this is unknown.
